ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Stonyhurst geomagnetic field 1-hour digital data in WDC format
ResourceHeader.Description: The geomagnetic field 1-hour digital data observed at Stonyhurst (STO) in WDC format.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the data suppliers and the WDC for Geomagnetism, Kyoto must properly be acknowledged.

AccessURL.Name: Geomagnetic Data Service
AccessURL.Description: Geomagnetic Data Service at World Data Center for Geomagnetism, Kyoto.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the data suppliers and the WDC for Geomagnetism, Kyoto must properly be acknowledged.

TimeSpan.Note: Latest information of data abailability is provided at http://wdc.kugi.kyoto-u.ac.jp/catmap/index.html

Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Atmosphere Solid Earth Geomagnetism Magnetic Field
EARTH SCIENCE Atmosphere Sun-earth Interactions Ionosphere/Magnetosphere Dynamics Magnetic Fields/Magnetic Currents

Parameter.Name: STO D hourly values in WDC format
Parameter.Description: Each data record is stored according to element and day. Details of the format is described at http://wdc.kugi.kyoto-u.ac.jp/hyplt/format/wdchrformat.html

Structure.Description: Each data record has 35 elements in 120 ASCII characters; observatory code, year, month, element, day, base value, 24 hourly values, daily mean value, and others.

Element.Name: Tabular Base
Element.Units: degree for D and I, hundreds of nT for other elements

Element.Name: Twenty-four 4-digit Hourly Values for the day
Element.Units: tenth-minutes for D and I, nT for other elements

Element.Name: Daily Mean
Element.Units: degree for D and I, hundreds of nT for other elements
